mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.phone_number AS "phoneNumber", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.sex AS "sex", a.industry_id AS "industryId", a.post_id AS "postId", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.organ_id AS "organId", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.owner AS "owner"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o9 ON o9.id = a.organ_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bj_examination_user( id, code, name, phone_number, sex, id_number, industry_id, post_id, birthday, organ_id, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, owner ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{industryId}, #{postId}, #{birthday}, #{organId}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{owner} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bj_examination_user SET code = #{code}, name = #{name}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, sex = #{sex}, id_number = #{idNumber}, industry_id = #{industryId}, post_id = #{postId}, birthday = #{birthday}, organ_id = #{organId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, owner = #{owner} WHERE id = #{id}
